title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved road transport access and travel time across and within the Central Mekong Delta Region

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Passenger car units including 4,000 goods vehicles per day use the project roads and bridges.

description.narrative: Improved road transport access and travel time across and within the Central Mekong Delta Region

title.narrative: Travel time (by hours) from Cao Lanh Ferry to Vam Cong Ferry reduced.
